name: NFCNDEFMessage
desc: An NFC NDEF message consisting of an array of payload records.

items.name: init(records: [NFCNDEFPayload])
items.desc: Creates an NDEF message with the specified records.

items.name: init?(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates an NDEF message from raw data representing the message.

items.name: var records: [NFCNDEFPayload]
items.desc: An array of records for the message.

items.name: var length: Int
items.desc: The length, in bytes, of the NDEF message when stored on an NFC tag.
